summary: This bill, the Inaugural Committee Transparency Act of 2025, aims to increase transparency regarding donations to and spending by Presidential Inaugural Committees. It mandates the disclosure of disbursements of $200 or more, including the purpose of each disbursement and the recipient's information. It also prohibits accepting donations from foreign nationals or converting donations to personal use. Finally, it requires the committee to disburse any remaining funds to a 501(c)(3) organization within 90 days of the inauguration.
